mapper.select: SELECT seq, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate, hit, delflag FROM board WHERE delflag = FALSE ORDER BY regdate DESC
SELECT seq, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate, hit, delflag FROM board WHERE delflag = FALSE ORDER BY regdate DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board WHERE delflag = FALSE
SELECT seq, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate, hit, delflag FROM board WHERE seq = #{seq} AND delflag = FALSE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (title, content, writer, regdate, hit, delflag) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{regdate}, #{hit}, FALSE)
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updatedate = #{updatedate} WHERE seq = #{seq} AND delflag = FALSE
UPDATE board SET delflag = TRUE, updatedate = NOW() WHERE seq = #{seq}
UPDATE board SET hit = hit + 1 WHERE seq = #{seq} AND delflag = FALSE
